com.facebook.react.fabric

类 FabricUIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.fabric.FabricUIManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    JSIModule, UIManager

    public class FabricUIManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIManager
    This class is responsible to create, clone and update ReactShadowNode using the Fabric API.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FabricUIManager(ReactApplicationContext reactContext, ViewManagerRegistry viewManagerRegistry)

      Registers a new root view.

      Appends the child ReactShadowNode to the children set of the parent ReactShadowNode.

      Adds the ReactShadowNode to the List received by parameter.

      ReactShadowNode cloneNodeWithNewChildren(ReactShadowNode node)

      Creates a new ReactShadowNode
      void removeRootView(int rootTag) 
      void updateRootView(ReactShadowNode rootCSSNode, int widthMeasureSpec, int heightMeasureSpec)
      Updates the styles of the ReactShadowNode based on the Measure specs received by parameters.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FabricUIManager

        public FabricUIManager(ReactApplicationContext reactContext,
                       ViewManagerRegistry viewManagerRegistry)

    • 方法详细资料

      • createNode

        @Nullable
public ReactShadowNode createNode(int reactTag,
                                            java.lang.String viewName,
                                            int rootTag,
                                            ReadableNativeMap props)
        Creates a new ReactShadowNode

      • cloneNode

        @Nullable
public ReactShadowNode cloneNode(ReactShadowNode node)
        返回:
        a clone of the ReactShadowNode received by parameter. The cloned ReactShadowNode will contain a copy of all the internal data of the original node, including its children set (note that the children nodes will not be cloned).

      • cloneNodeWithNewChildren

        @Nullable
public ReactShadowNode cloneNodeWithNewChildren(ReactShadowNode node)
        返回:
        a clone of the ReactShadowNode received by parameter. The cloned ReactShadowNode will contain a copy of all the internal data of the original node, but its children set will be empty.

      • cloneNodeWithNewProps

        @Nullable
public ReactShadowNode cloneNodeWithNewProps(ReactShadowNode node,
                                                       @Nullable
                                                       ReadableNativeMap newProps)
        返回:
        a clone of the ReactShadowNode received by parameter. The cloned ReactShadowNode will contain a copy of all the internal data of the original node, but its props will be overridden with the ReadableMap received by parameter.

      • cloneNodeWithNewChildrenAndProps

        @Nullable
public ReactShadowNode cloneNodeWithNewChildrenAndProps(ReactShadowNode node,
                                                                  ReadableNativeMap newProps)
        返回:
        a clone of the ReactShadowNode received by parameter. The cloned ReactShadowNode will contain a copy of all the internal data of the original node, but its props will be overridden with the ReadableMap received by parameter and its children set will be empty.

      • appendChild

        @Nullable
public void appendChild(ReactShadowNode parent,
                                  ReactShadowNode child)
        Appends the child ReactShadowNode to the children set of the parent ReactShadowNode.

      • createChildSet

        public java.util.List<ReactShadowNode> createChildSet(int rootTag)
        返回:
        an empty List that will be used to append the ReactShadowNode elements of the root. Typically this List will contain one element.

      • appendChildToSet

        public void appendChildToSet(java.util.List<ReactShadowNode> childList,
                             ReactShadowNode child)
        Adds the ReactShadowNode to the List received by parameter.

      • completeRoot

        public void completeRoot(int rootTag,
                         java.util.List<ReactShadowNode> childList)

      • addRootView

        public <T extends SizeMonitoringFrameLayout & MeasureSpecProvider> int addRootView(T rootView)
        从接口复制的说明: UIManager
        Registers a new root view.
        指定者:
        addRootView 在接口中 UIManager

      • removeRootView

        public void removeRootView(int rootTag)

      • updateRootView

        public void updateRootView(ReactShadowNode rootCSSNode,
                           int widthMeasureSpec,
                           int heightMeasureSpec)
        Updates the styles of the ReactShadowNode based on the Measure specs received by parameters.
